Articles.Content:
Hey, this is something that has been bugging me for an age but I haven't got round to mentioning it till now. When I go into map view and my engine is firing, not only does the volume of the engine SFX change (as if i'm changing throttle) but it also pans from one ear to another in a very weird way when the map camera is moved.

I'm pretty sure everyone has come across this issue (I think I've heard it in many a youtube video), but I would just like to bring it up and see if there is a fix I am just ignorant of.

Cheers.

(Ps. I get this on both my Mac and PC)

Yeah, this problem has been around for a while. I know exactly what you're talking about and it's kind of annoying.

I don't know if the cause is really known. If it's a unity or KSP thing.... :/
If I recall correctly, that's a very very old bug that was fixed, then later unfixed.
Definitely was a bug in 0.25. Seems like the farther out you zoom in map ('m' key) view, the worse the problem gets with the sound cutting in/out.
